title: Monitor anything you want.
subtitle: Intro into prometheus-client libs and writing your first exporter.
description:
Monitor anything you want with Prometheus or Graphite using Grafana.
Who doesn't know it.You have some very nice Software build or a Project finished.And you want to monitor the most important metrics of that Project or Software.That is where Prometheus and Graphite kick in.Using them you can store your metrics in a easy queryable way for Grafana to show them.This ensures that you are able to view insights of your project or your newly build Software.
